ValidationRule.description: BODEV-3209 & BO-1877: Users cannot add Integrations Hub Standard Package or 10 Additional Integrations Hub Configurations product to New Business or Upsell Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business - Expansion Portal" ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000Si1yAAC', Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000Si23AAC' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot add Integrations Hub Standard Package or 10 Additional Integrations Hub Configurations product to New business or Upsell opportunities, instead use individual integration products.
